Minneapolis Winter Coat Drive 2019

Thank you to everyone who made our 5th annual coat drive a success!

Final Numbers:
- 1,247 coats collected (surpassing our goal of 1,000!)
- 89 volunteers over 3 weekends
- Distribution to 14 partner organizations including:
  - Salvation Army Minneapolis
  - Catholic Charities
  - Simpson Housing Services
  - Tubman Center

Drop-off locations (NOW CLOSED):
- Midtown Global Market, 920 E Lake St (closed Dec 20, 2019)
- Powderhorn Park Community Center (closed Dec 18, 2019)
- Hennepin County Library - Franklin Ave (closed Dec 22, 2019)

Special thanks to our sponsors: Target, General Mills Foundation, and the Minneapolis Foundation.

Planning for the 2020 drive will begin in September. If you'd like to volunteer or sponsor, contact Maria at coats@mplscares.org.
